vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.14.49;
son of: Saul (H7586G) and Ahinoam (H0293);
brother of: Jonathan (H3083H), Abinadab (H0041H), Merab (H4764) and Michal (H4324);
half-brother of: Ish-bosheth (H0378), Armoni (H0764) and Mephibosheth (H4648H)
§ Malchishua or Melchishua = "my king is wealth"
a son of king Saul of Israel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo del rey Saúl; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
麥基舒亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我的王很富有"
以色列掃羅王的眾子之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
麦基舒亚 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "我的王很富有"
以色列扫罗王的众子之一
